## Client.searchImage() method

Perform a search through indexed images of a search engine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
searchImage(query: Query | SearchImageParams, image: string): Promise<SearchResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  query | [Query](./doofinder.query.md) \| [SearchImageParams](./doofinder.searchimageparams.md) | An instance of <code>Query</code> or an object with valid search parameters. |
|  image | string | string image in base 64. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SearchResponse](./doofinder.searchresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise to be fullfilled with the response or rejected with a `ClientResponseError`<!-- -->.
